Subject: Poetry Open Mike
Description: We are all made of stories and sharing them can be powerful and life changing. Come and share our version of an open mic night.Â  Bring your self-written poetry, personal manifesto, or short-short story.  Speakers include:Jim Leach, Matt Betts, Sean Davis, Jessical Roland - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Poetry Starter Kit
Description: Audience Participation Panel: Speculative Poetry Starter Kit: who to read, where to look and exactly what the heck IS speculative poetry.  Speakers include:Jim Leach, Sean Davis - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Self Editing Tools
Description: Before you expose your precious words to others, you want them to look their best. Clif will discuss a few of the off-the-shelf tools for grammar checking your work with emphasis on checkIt (potential name change), a tool written by a writer for writers to make their prose stronger.  Speakers include:Clif Flynt, Sean Davis - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
